name: Derycz Scientific
overview: Derycz Scientific, Inc. (Derycz) is a holding company with one wholly owned subsidiary, Reprints Desk, Inc. (Reprints) and one majority owned subsidiary, Pools Press, Inc. (Pools). Derycz, through Reprints and Pools, provides its customers with copies of published content, such as articles from published journals, in either electronic or hard copy form. Its customers use this content for marketing, regulatory or research purposes. It obtains the permissions from the owners of the contentâ€™s copyrights so that the reproduction complies with copyright laws. It also offers services to publishers, whereby it is responsible for all aspects of reprint and e-print production, from taking orders to final delivery. Pools Press also offers other commercial printing products, such as the production of booklets and newsletters. It aggregates published materials and charge a fee for copies of them.

milestones.description: Derycz Scientific Raises $3 Million in Private Placement
milestones.source_description: Derycz Scientific Raises $3 Million in Private Placement
